markdown:
<title level="1" right="Action">[Lumbering Knockdown](/Actions.aspx?ID=1158) <actions string="Two Actions" /></title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Pathfinder #177: Burning Tundra](/Sources.aspx?ID=116) pg. 74

</column>

---

Your triceratops Strides up to 10 feet, then makes a horns Strike. On a success, the target is knocked [prone](/Conditions.aspx?ID=31).
name: Lumbering Knockdown
